overview.title: Overview
overview.description:
Our software design process is tailored to deliver high-quality, scalable solutions. By integrating best practices, modern design patterns, and agile methodologies, we ensure the development of robust, user-friendly applications.

Design Principles

  • Modularity: Break down the software into manageable, reusable components.
  • Scalability: Ensure the system can handle growing loads.
  • Maintainability: Code is easy to understand and modify.
  • Security: Implement best practices to ensure secure software.
  • Usability: Focus on a user-friendly interface.

development_services.title: Businesses of all sizes benefit from Software
development_services.description: Hiring a software development firm provides businesses of all sizes with cost-effective and high-quality services, crucial for achieving customer satisfaction in a competitive market. Partnering with such firms offers various additional benefits, ensuring business sustainability. Therefore, engaging a custom software development company with the necessary skills and expertise is essential.

services.title: Nexdecade gives the developer a selection of reliable and assessed solutions to work with.
We are language neutral and so can be applied to any language that supports object-orientation.
We aid communication by the very fact that they are well documented and can be researched if that is not the case.
We have a proven track record as they are already being widely used and thus reduce the technical risk to the project.
We are highly flexible and can be used in practically any type of application or domain.

system_design.title: Electronics
system_design.description: As part of our total product design portfolio, Nexdecade provides professional baseband, embedded and user interface, electronics design, and testing services for companies that are designing products requiring excellent hardware performance. Nexdecade’s combination of baseband expertise and hardware laboratory facilities offers professional services for design and testing purposes.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description:
Over the past five years, Over-the-Top (OTT) video services have garnered significant attention as a novel platform, particularly in the United States. Recently, Bangladesh has embraced this trend over the last year and a half, with Nexdecade pioneering the development of its own hardware and software for OTT services. Currently, we oversee operations for Bengal Screen and Toffee.
The expansion of OTT services owes much to advancements in broadband infrastructure and the strategic distribution efforts of content providers, including Pay TV operators. These strategies have extended OTT platforms beyond traditional television to mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets. Pay TV providers are actively broadening their OTT offerings to enrich subscriber experiences with abundant content, ensuring seamless access to Video-on-Demand (VOD) and live TV across multiple devices. To stay ahead in this dynamic market and meet evolving subscriber demands, we have secured cutting-edge OTT platforms, particularly in Android TV, enhancing VOD capabilities across secondary devices.

ott_services.title: OTT Software
ott_services.description: The future isn't approaching; it's already here. We provide a comprehensive suite of OTT platform services to enable you to transcend conventional boundaries and innovate beyond reality.

title: Influencer Marketing
description: Real-time tracking solutions that provide insights into vehicle locations, speed, and routes. Our system enhances fleet management by offering precise data and reporting, improving operational efficiency and reducing costs.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: A vehicle tracking system design involves developing a robust infrastructure to monitor and manage the movement of vehicles in real-time. It includes components like GPS receivers, communication interfaces, databases for storing location data, and user interfaces for visualization and control. The design aims to ensure accuracy, reliability, and efficiency in tracking vehicle locations, enabling functionalities such as route optimization, fleet management, and theft prevention.
